tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE comedy_specials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    comedian VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE,
    rating FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE ComedySpecials (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    release_year INT,
    duration_minutes INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    rating FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE comedy_specials (
   special_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   title VARCHAR(255),
   comedian VARCHAR(255),
   genre VARCHAR(50),
   release_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
   user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50),
   email VARCHAR(255),
   subscription_type VARCHAR(20),
   join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recommended_specials (
   recommendation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT,
   special_id INT,
   recommendation_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (special_id) REFERENCES comedy_specials(special_id)
);
